attributes.action: Future lockdowns to be National. All UK together for same length of time.
attributes.additional_details: Unfortunately not everyone will abide by the rules, and will cross borders. We need to stop our NHS being overwhelmed. We need to look after people s mental health. We need too get the economy on the road to recovery. We must stand together.
attributes.background: All Ministers of England, Wales, Scotland and Ireland to implement lockdowns Nationaly for the same duration.

rejection.details:
The UK Government is only responsible for lockdown restrictions in England. Restrictions in Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland are a matter for the devolved administrations in those nations.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to seek to coordinate future lockdowns with Scotland, Wales or Northern Ireland.
